headline.main: Bishop Stires Urges More Aid to Britain; Offering for Church of England Also Asked

lead_paragraph: A call for a united front of "the whole Christian church" and a special three-point program of the Episcopal Church leading to a "great sacrificial offering all over the country" to aid the Church of England was sounded yesterday by the Right Rev. Ernest M. Stires, Bishop of the Long Island Disocese of the Episcopal Church.
